sentences.en: As a healer of bodies I had scant success.
sentences.cn: 作为治疗肌体的医生,我的成就甚微.

sentences.en: Don't scant the butter when you make a cake.
sentences.cn: 做糕饼时不要吝惜奶油.

sentences.en: He paid scant attention to what was said.
He received scant compassion or even understanding.
sentences.cn: 人们很少同情他,更谈不上了解他.

sentences.en: I paid scant attention to what she was saying.
sentences.cn: 我没大注意她在说什么。

sentences.en: In fact, Richard Savage had known Edward Bellamy a scant five hours.
sentences.cn: 实际上，理查德·萨维奇和爱德华·贝拉米相识才仅仅5个小时。

sentences.en: Many mothers pay scant attention to their own needs when their children are small.
sentences.cn: 孩子们小的时候,许多母亲都忽视自己的需求.

sentences.en: She began to berate the police for paying scant attention to the theft from her car.
sentences.cn: 她开始痛斥警方对她车内被窃一案不够关注。

sentences.en: The expeditions were often out of meat, and scant of clothes.
sentences.cn: 探险人常常吃不到肉, 衣服也很缺乏.

sentences.en: The general had to scant his men's rations.
sentences.cn: 将军不得不减少士兵的口粮.

sentences.en: The story has received scant attention in the press.
sentences.cn: 这件事没在报界引起多少注意。

sentences.en: They produce goods with scant regard for quality.
sentences.cn: 他们的产品不够重视质量。

sentences.en: This hole was a scant .23 inches in diameter.
sentences.cn: 这个洞眼的直径只有0.23英寸。

sentences.en: Tom's family was scant of money.
Use a scant cup of flour.
When the boar was a scant seventy - five feet away, he fired.
sentences.cn: 当野猪离他不到 七十五 尺的时候, 他开了枪.

sentences.en: You have a scant hour in which to pack.
sentences.cn: 你有一小时来整理行李.
